questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

An IT manager must modify the default Dynamics 365 Sales app and add a custom sales report to the app.

You need to describe the actions required.

Which actions should you perform for each requirement? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
C. Microsoft Office
D. CRM

Selected Answer: BD
ERP and CRM

It says which two sources:
CRM and microsoft Office
It gathers information from your CRM system and Microsoft Office and enriches it with actionable insights, so you can be more effective right where you spend most of your day.
"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/leverage-sales-capabilities/8-describe-microsoft-copilot-sales"

questions.question_text:
You need to identify the data sources that Microsoft Copilot for Sales can use.

Which two sources should you identify? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

discussion.content:
A work order can have multiple inspections, number 2 should be yes:

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

A company uses Dynamics 365 Field Service. Technicians in the company use work orders and inspections to complete their tasks.

For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

DRAG DROP
-

A company plans to implement Dynamics 365 Customer Service.

The company has the following requirements:

• Track responses to a service call based on the time guaranteed for a customer.
• Track the remaining number of maintenance checks based on the quantity of checks allocated to each customer.

You need to configure the tracking requirements.

Which components should you use? To answer, move the appropriate components to the correct requirements. You may use each component once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to move the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
should be C, using chatbots before moving to an Agent

Selected Answer: C
It is C
Should be Omnichannel to make use of chatbots, no?

questions.question_text:
A company interacts with customers on the company website.

The company wants to improve the customer experience by using conversational AI to filter information before the agent is contacted.

You need to recommend a product that meets the requirement.

Which product should you recommend?
